summary: The diff summary does not show any changes to the pond creation or user membership logic in `backend/main.mo`; only a metadata/state file was updated. Based on the provided evidence, the requested backend fixes (REQ-1, REQ-2) are not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the backend pond-creation logic so that when a new pond is created, only the creating principal (`caller`) is added as a member (and optionally as the initial moderator/admin per existing behavior), rather than adding all known/initialized users.
missing_requirements.reason: No visible modifications to the `createPond(...)` logic or pond `members`/`memberCount` initialization are present in the diff summary; `backend/main.mo` content shown is type/variable definitions only and is truncated before any `createPond` implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure pond creation updates user membership state only for the creating principal (e.g., the creator’s `UserProfile.joinedPonds`), and does not append the new pond to every user’s profile or any global joined-pond list for other principals.
missing_requirements.reason: No visible changes show updates to user profile membership (`UserProfile.joinedPonds`) during pond creation being restricted to `caller`; `project_state.json` indicates the request remains pending.
